data.title: Expo Cultures of the World: Representing 84 countries
data.meta_description: The Business School of the Universidad Panamericana Campus Guadalajara organized for the third consecutive year the Expo Cultures of the World.
data.text:
ZAPOPAN, Jalisco, May 18, 2023.- With the objective of generating greater cultural integration and encouraging business, the Business School of the University of Jalisco, in the Universidad Panamericana Guadalajara Campus organized for the third consecutive year the Expo Cultures of the World.

World Cultures Expo

The objective was for each team to present various cultural aspects, including the business profile of their respective country, to the attendees, who acted as investors. Their participation consisted of providing support, evaluating and asking questions to the teams.

Participation of 84 countries

This semester 84 teams participated, representing different countries such as Denmark, Australia, Chile and Italy, among others, and had the collaboration of university members who acted as businessmen evaluators, as well as parents, close to a thousand members of the university community and friends.

In the coming weeks, a jury will evaluate the teams based on three key aspects: the best booth, the best speech and the best presentation. The selection criteria will be based on the professionalism and overall impact of each team.
